snippet: Boston clinched the Northeast Division at Madison Square Garden but seemed to take more gratification in beating the Rangers for the first time in four tries this season.
lead_paragraph: Boston clinched the Northeast Division at Madison Square Garden but seemed to take more gratification in beating the Rangers for the first time in four tries this season.

headline.seo: Bruins’ Division Title Comes With Few Cheers
headline.main: Little Cheering Accompanies Bruins’ Division Title
headline.print_headline: Little Cheering Accompanies Bruins’ Division Title
